summary: Skyforge Steel Daggers couldn\'t be improved with Grindstones. This has been fixed.
descriptionHtml:
[size=16][center]Notice:[/size][/center]
This download has been supplanted by my [URL=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020]Lost Art of the Blacksmith[/url] which adds all known missing crafting upgrades.  

Description:
Skyforge Steel Daggers can now be improved with grindstones, like any other Skyforge weapons. Nothing else has been changed, and you can still purchase them from Eurlond Gray-mane in Whiterun. 

Installation:
Extract the .esp file to your \\Skyrim\\data directory, and enable the file in your game launcher. 

If you correctly installed the mod and your Data Files option is greyed out in the launcher, you will need to do the following.
1. Go to Documents -> My Games -> Skyrim
2. Open up the SkyrimPrefs.ini file
3. Look about half way down for [Launcher]
4. Add \'bEnableFileSelection=1\' no quotes and save.
author: Impulseve
